title: Utopia is Nowhere
description:
This week, Meredith and Patton talk about Artists Alley, climate change, the new Covid surge, and more! Have something interesting you'd like to share? Email us at HeyDidYouGetMyText@gmail.com or leave us a message at speakpipe.com/didyougetmytext.
